document_data.name: Galen Addakal
document_data.mainbody:
'''Galen Addakal''' was a [[bloodforge]] mage in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

Galen was an arrogant bully who wandered the land hurting people. After a rampage through the villages of the [[Realm of Lands]] raised complaints, the leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]] vowed to punish Galen in a bloodforge battle.
